name: Wired (itch)
description:
Wired is a puzzle-platformer game, where you play as Ohm, a robot whose mission is to stop the Govern's spaceship before it eliminates the resistance. To complete your mission, you should avoid enemies and walk through wires to solve puzzles.
Good Luck!

Credits

Andressa Kranen - Artist

Bernardo Herdy - Sound Designer

Lucas Pereira - Game Designer

René Abreu - Programmer
